subject: 2 EVP's
author: usmcmacswife
full_text:
I was able to finally figure out how to take pieces of the files and change to MP3 format etc. The one file was at a place my husband worked at within the military so dying in combat was not a strange response.
Second was I was hurting holding something and passed it off to my husband and the "sooo" I feel is the one man being funny  because earlier in the EVP session I had said it hurt too but kept going through holding the dowsing rods. :o)

Please let me know what you all think!
